topContent:
Aries Airflo Heating & Air Conditioning is a full service HVAC company that provides services in residential new construction, commercial construction, service and replacements.

In 2004, two Red Deer Lennox dealers who have been serving Central Alberta since 1980 - Aries Mechanical Systems and Airflo Heating & Air Conditioning were merged to form Aries Airflo Heating & Air Conditioning.

Locally owned and operated by Linda and Terry Codd, Aries Airflo continues to proudly serve Central Alberta from their 12,000 square foot facility in Burnt Lake Industrial Park.
experience: With over 30 years of experience in the HVAC industry our team is committed to providing prompt service, quality workmanship and an enjoyable experience.
peopleContent: Aries Airflo Heating & Air Conditioning has developed a great working atmosphere which allows us to attract and maintain a staff of over 30 qualified, experienced, loyal and caring individuals. Our people play a huge part in our success as we continue to strive to be an industry leader.
mission: Our mission is to provide quality design, installation and service for heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) equipment in both residential and  commercial markets.
